S

SignatureAuthenticationHandler - Class in net.adamcin.sling.auth.httpsig.impl
Implementation of AuthenticationHandler to support HTTP Signature authentication for one configured user, such as the admin user or another user designated for use by automated deployment and configuration management systems.
